reviews.review_text: Fun for a bit until you realise how bad the randomness of the cards is.. losing matches when the opponent has one card left just because you have spent 5+ rounds getting utter junk to play. 5 hours of gameplay is really just repeating the start of the game over and over because of the nature of the game.
Easily one of the most fun Solitare/RPG mash ups I've ever played. Worth every penny and been playing it since launch.
Well, I know it's not helpfull but this is a great game for puzzle, solitaire and rogue-like lovers.  Hope many people will buy it and sees its greatness.
Really fun and adictive little game. I always loved solitaire but this one add some cute twist to it. I recommend this game to anyone and it also work great on a tablet. Sorry for my english. :)

This is a fantastic casual game! Yes it has randomness. Because it's basically solitaire. You know, that game where you randomly shuffle a deck of cards to play? Don't let that scare you off. If you want a nice game where you can use a little strategy and a little luck to kill some time, this is the one for you. It has decent graphics and humor to boot. I love it!
Incredibly polished game with a good sense of humor, and enough complexity to give it lots of replay value.

If you're looking for a fun casual game, you can't go past Solitairica!   It's your basic golf Solitaire with basic RPG elements thrown in - collecting power, casting spells, enemies that can attack, etc. Add in some basic rogue-like elements (each game is a run of enemies, culminating in a final boss) and this is a winner. Pick it up if you see it on sale, and you too will be after just one more run... just one more run...
